[[Image:Annette Crosbie.jpg|thumb|Annette Crosbie in ''[[wikipedia:One Foot in the Grave|One Foot in the Grave]]'']]
'''Annette Crosbie''', [[Order of the British Empire|OBE]] ([[12 February|February 12]], [[1934]]) is a Scottish character actress. She provided the voice of [[Galadriel]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]].
